blog.name: jennyboom21
blog.title: Boom
blog.description: I'm here for The Gay. Built like a box spring mattress; closet nerd with a penchant for dropping truth bombs; digs attractive humans. Not everything is as it seems, so question everything. Everyone is a lil Kinsey 3.

summary: Lol some people are hilarious. Did I read that someone thinks your anon response could force Braylor to come out? Umm those...
question: Lol some people are hilarious. Did I read that someone thinks your anon response could force Braylor to come out? Umm those posts barely make a dent in Tumblr world.  Should we remind these people that fans were shipping Tessa and Brie and Brie didn’t care. Girl is very comfortable with her sexuality and knows exactly what she’s doing. Most of her IG posts have wlws lusting after her & she keeps posting. Tay just wore a pride flag as a performance outfit. They are doing it all by themselves.
answer: I JUST recovered from Brie wearing THAT red jacket last week! But agree to all of this! You should see the convo in that post I had to have with Brie Larson stans! Taylor is going hard with the gay imagery, and Brie is posting thirst traps (i swear she has to have a tumblr), KILLING all the wlws! I’m just waiting to get slaughtered whenever Brie posts something gay af.

“The energy core. Where is it?”

“Pararescue is on the way. You have two minutes until you’re surrounded.”

“Then I see no reason to prolong this conversation.”

i’m so in love with so many people??

summary: yes! yes! kids with kit, pls! have a great day, friend!
question: yes! yes! kids with kit, pls! have a great day, friend!
answer:
Kids with Unicorn Store Kit



[quick A/N: because i am a girl i do see all my fics as girlxgirl :)]


-sO little baby kit’s and y/n’s 🥺

-i see a boy and a girl

-the boy is the oldest by three years

-he loves spiderman

-but also loves cinderella

-we dont judge in this household

-his bedroom is blue with spiderman everything

-y’all literally cleared the aisles of any store that stocked anything spiderman related

-the daughter tho 🥺

-when she was born she had a yellow bedroom

-but when she is 5 she gets to choose her own room

-she has pink glittery walls

-“like mummys room!!”

-she loves rapunzel

-and disney

-she has loads of barbie dolls

-and is constantly stealing her brothers spiderman so he can “date” her barbies

-obviously, she loves unicorns too

-not as much as her mummy but quite a lot!

-y’all do eventually cave in and get a small pony and call it steve

-you go on quite a few family holidays

-disneyland

-family pics in front of the castle with the mickey ears!

-italy

-idk why but i just saw in my head a pic of kit and the kids trying to demolish a breastick i-

-london

-going on the london eye 🥺

-but the best family days were spent at home on the couch having movie days!!

-every week someone new got to decide what to watch

-usually the order is kit, you, son, daughter

-the night before kit and yourself go shopping for a ton of snacks!

-way too much popcorn

-y’all just overestimate on the popcorn

-oH and names

-i see the boy being called Michael

-Mickey for short

-and the girl being called Olivia

-or Poppy!!!

-imma just sum up and say y’all are just the cutest family

-y’all should make one of those family instas

-just sayin’


[A/N: I hope you enjoyed! requests are open for all of Brie’s characters and Brie herself!]

summary: Avengers Cast Savagely Roast Brie Larson & Her Lies About Doing Her Own ...  Wait, ugly, older bearded and spiteful man hates on...
caption:
Avengers Cast Savagely Roast Brie Larson & Her Lies About Doing Her Own …

Wait, ugly, older bearded and spiteful man hates on Brie Larson.

I didn’t realize they made a sequel to Room.

‘Now lets focus on her body language! Her own butt had a stunt double! Who talks about this!? What is wrong with her body? And didn’t that co-star look at her once in a way that is strange.’ 

Fucking creepy how he in-depth examines every interview. This man is a stalker. And obsessive.

blog.name: a-simple-imagine
blog.title:
Just Let Me Go...
Its Okay
blog.description: Alice. 22. I channel my sad energy into reader inserts for TV/film Characters. Currently ACCEPTING requests. Masterlist

title: 6. After Sex Kisses
body:
Requested by me: Gentle kisses shared between the reader and Carol after sex as they discuss their dinner plans

Pairing: Carol Danvers x reader

Words: 377

TRIGGER WARNING - Suggestive themes, I guess

You lay drowning in the fading smell of sex and sweat. Limbs tangled. A lazy smile resting on your lips as you stare at the ceiling above. You hear your girlfriend shuffle on the bed beside you, turning onto her side and propping her head up on her elbow.

“Are you okay?” She wonders quietly as you turn to look at her. The blonde leans in and gently presses her lips to yours in a slow and tender embrace.

“Mhmm,” You nod as she pulls away. “Never better.”

“Do you want some water or something?”

You shuffle closer to the naked woman; shaking your head as you place your hand on her jaw and reconnect your lips. Carol smiles against your lips.

“What do you wanna do for dinner?” You ask, resting your head on your girlfriend’s chest. Carol’s fingers dance over your bare stomach drawing little invisible shapes.

“Maybe we should just go out?”

“I’m not sure my legs will get me that far,” You tease and you can just tell Carol is wearing a smirk. Lips gently press against the top of your head.

“How about we just order a pizza?” the blonde mumbles lowly; moving to place a kiss against your flushed cheek. “Maybe some mozzarella sticks.” Carol moves from underneath you and you fall flat against the mattress. Turning so you lay on your back, she climbs on top of you. “We can cuddle.” Her teeth nip at the skin of your collarbone before she buries her face in the crook of your neck. “We could put on a movie and just… relax.” Her teeth sink into your skin earning a gentle moan. You lose yourself in the feeling as she begins to pepper little quick kisses all over your body. You squirm a little under her touch. Maybe she’s trying to start something again. You reach out for her when she reaches your hips in order to get her to stop which she does; immediately before crawling up your body. Resting on your lower torso, her palms run over your chest. Staring down at you with nothing short of admiration in her eyes.

“That sounds perfect.” You reply, gently kissing her hand. “Can we get ice cream too?”

“Anything you want baby girl.”

“I’m not sure my legs will get me that far,” You tease and you can just tell Carol is wearing a smirk. Lips gently press against the top of your head.

“How about we just order a pizza?” the blonde mumbles lowly; moving to place a kiss against your flushed cheek. “Maybe some mozzarella sticks.” Carol moves from underneath you and you fall flat against the mattress. Turning so you lay on your back, she climbs on top of you. “We can cuddle.” Her teeth nip at the skin of your collarbone before she buries her face in the crook of your neck. “We could put on a movie and just… relax.” Her teeth sink into your skin earning a gentle moan. You lose yourself in the feeling as she begins to pepper little quick kisses all over your body. You squirm a little under her touch. Maybe she’s trying to start something again. You reach out for her when she reaches your hips in order to get her to stop which she does; immediately before crawling up your body. Resting on your lower torso, her palms run over your chest. Staring down at you with nothing short of admiration in her eyes.

“That sounds perfect.” You reply, gently kissing her hand. “Can we get ice cream too?”

“Anything you want baby girl.”
